title: Dmitri Avramenko
text:
Dmitri Mikhaylovich Avramenko (; born 8 June 1992) is a Russian professional <a href="Association%20football">football</a> player.
Club career.
He made his <a href="Russian%20Football%20National%20League">Russian Football National League</a> debut for <a href="FC%20Fakel%20Voronezh">FC Fakel Voronezh</a> on 26 April 2012 in a game against <a href="FC%20Baltika%20Kaliningrad">FC Baltika Kaliningrad</a>.
